item.title: Daniela Beißer
item.description: I am a postdoctoral researcher in the department of Genome Informatics headed by Sven Rahmann at the University of Duisburg-Essen, Germany. I am working as a bioinformatician with a focus on next-generation sequencing analysis. My current projects include the detection of structural variants in damaged genomes, functional and taxonomic assessment in metatranscriptome sequencing data and the analysis of new pathogens by assembling the genome and transcriptome. Furthermore, I am working on methods for integrated network analysis using different *omics datasets in conjunction with biological networks.
